title: Riven is not Broken and here's why
body:
Riven is not broken, ill give you a few reasons as to why you all think she is the most broken champ ever. (Note: Im not a riven main so dont think im writing this because i love the champ, im simply stating the obvious as to why shes not broken)

"She snowballs soo hard and does soo much damage" excuse.

Heres why she snowballs: In your bronze, silver, gold, plat, even low diamond games she gets fed because of one reason: Dumb ass laners. Too commonly i see people say "omg so broken riot nerf please report lol scrub playing ez champ" and that person saying that is playing {{champion:57}} top and their first back was a {{item:1026}} and {{item:1001}}. Why on earth would you be building damage against a champ that is specifically used to nuke squishy champs like Mids and ADC's. BUILD A {{item:1031}}. There's a reason why armor is a direct counter to a riven. How on earth will a riven do damage to an armored champion when all her abilities do AD damage (hint: She wont do any damage.) Then that same {{champion:57}}  dies in lane 5 times and she gets fed and everyone complains that shes nuking you out which leads me to my next point

Your team doesn't know how to play against her

Riven is a Master Yi type champ, if you let her run past your team and onto your squishes SHE WILL DESTROY THEM THAT'S HER JOB. Is it really that hard for a {{champion:111}} or a {{champion:79}} to just hard CC her? She gets blown the hell up if you just stun her and lock her down LIKE ANY BURST CHAMP. You could literally {{champion:4}} gold card her and in that stun duration your team can 100-0 her and shes out of the fight. 

"But she kills me in 3 seconds as an adc" 

Wait.... what? You're near her as an adc? WHY??! 

This is such a common complaint. And the simple answer is that you blow at positioning. Why on earth are you even in range of her? All of her abilities have the range of an auto attack, she needs to get close to do damage which also leaves her vulnerable to CC when shes in your back line which leads to an easy kill on her since you can burst her in seconds. Its so easy, if you see a riven running full speed at you JUST KITE! DONT JUST STAND THERE AND TAKE IT. Now i understand if she flashes on top of you that's something that can be hard to control but still thats about once in every 4 team fights and even then you can flash out of her range and continue to kite. 

"But shes soo op in (Blank) oriented team comp" 

Well, aren't all champs op in specific team comps? Kogmaw is the best ADC in protect the carry comps, Jayce is op in poke comps, Nautalius is op in hard engage comps, I'm failing to see your point in this excuse. 

 Now I do understand that a fed riven can be the most annoying champ but its not that hard to stop her. Can riot tweak her a little bit and change some of her abilities? Of course, they can do that to so many champs to balance the game. Is she as broken as we all think? Not in the slightest,   it comes down to how you play against her. If you let her just run to your backline and kill your carries of course shes op, but if you shut her down early in lane (Build armor), CC her, peel for your carries, etc. I dont see why you cant handle this champ. 

You can choose to write this off as a BS post about someone who knows nothing but face it, this champ is strong, yes that is true, but is she really that broken? No.

This was posted last night, and thoroughly rebutted.

A Diamond 1 Riven main got his ass completedly chewed and mathed back down, there is no reason to post any other threads saying Riven is fine. She is not, and hasn't been for years.

i think what throws many people off, is that she can be a lane bully who still scales strong (or at least not shitty) into the lategame.

this causes an effect that when she snowballs off her lane, shes a massive threat to the entire team. similar to what happens when melee carries or irelia snowballs.

only that those have a weak early game to compensate.

her mobility is also fairly unrestricted. she isnt forced to target enemy or allied units like jax or yasuo for example. making her more mobile than those champions, and making it hard to play around her mobility.

flash, w, q, q, q auto attack doesnt leave you many options at level 4, when she locks you up with cc. maybe a way to fix her would be to remove that knockup from early ranks of her q, and have it at full strength at rank 5. and then give her some small buff for her lategame.

nailed it

Which is why i said "Dumb ass laners" Its not that shes so broken. its that the players dont understand her and cant get through their head that you shouldnt really fight a riven early unless you are like a darius or someone who has a dick ton of damage. Just farm her out, get armor and then go from there.

This is why I don't pick Glass cannon laners and Junglers. Defenses seem to be more gold efficient than Offensive stats. Probably because your needing to tank the entire enemy team as the teams tank. And the major trade off for defenses being better is that you lack tower trading and objective taking power. But as a top laner, those don't matter as much. (unless your playing the split pusher.) 

Also in the laning phase, Building tank stats is easy cause you only need to focus on one kind of stat that early in the game. (that to counter you Opponent.) Usually when I'm up in the top lane (which is not that often) I usually pick Sion. I can usually Rush Frozen Heart, which would cut her damage in half, while giving me much more frequent poke. What would she do against that? Call in her Jungler? Most likely her Jungler is either AD, making the Frozen Heart rush a double whammy. Or another tank. Making it that much more difficult to take down while (if my teammates are smart) another objective is pressured when the enemy Jungler shows top lane. 

The only other way Riven can possibly snowball like that is if she pulls off a Teleport gank. Yet the problem with that is A) As a Tank, I have enough CC to stop the TP should I see her channeling it. Or B) As the Top laner, Match her TP. This can be tricky if you don't know she's TPing, yet a smart top laner would Identify good positions where a TP gank would be helpful.

Exactly my point, these kids dont understand how to face a Riven. Its utterly disappointing that the community cant wrap their bronze brains around the points your making which are 100 percent true and valid.
